content: Tony Stubblebine could you pass the link to the collection then, please? Patrik Edblad nice article. I agree. Talent on its own is worthless. Grit is far more relevant to achieve goals. Talent and grit together are quite rare in my opinion. The practice, practice, practive bit is fundamental to learn grit. Not sure if you know of interesting techniques here to adopt. Lately I am reading something in this area and there are some quite interesting things that I am learning…
